titleStmt.title: The humble petition of divers inhabitants of the city of London, and places adjacent, in the behalf of the poore of this nation. Together, vvith the humble representation of the presentors thereof. With the answer thereunto, and the names of those that are added to the Committee of Complaints, to whom those that find themselves agrieved, or can offer any thing for the good or the poor, may make their address. March 10. 1648-49. Imprimatur Theodore Jennings.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
